Our Services

Aarush International Education Limited provides a comprehensive range of services to assist students in their academic journey.

Study Abroad

Assist with university selection, application process, and admission guidance.

Visa Assistance

Provide support with visa application process and documentation.

Career Counseling

Offer personalized guidance for academic and career path planning.

Test Preparation

Offer classes for TOEFL, IELTS, SAT, GRE, and GMAT exams.

Financial Documentation

Assist with financial documentation and scholarship guidance.

Travel Assistance

Provide guidance for travel arrangements and accommodation.
